problem_text: In \odot P, the diameter is 9, find the length of \widehat Q T. Round to the nearest hundredth.
compact_text: In \odot P, the diameter is 9, find the length of \widehat QT. Round to the nearest hundredth.
annotat_text: In $\odot P$, the diameter is $9$, find the length of $\widehat {QT}$. Round to the nearest hundredth.
